trends: There have been no other sightings in Rose Valley
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details12 to 14 stars above my house buzzing and screaming sound they were in rosevalley then three flew to goble creek and were flying withvsearch lights looking in creek area beaming up rocks bolders no shi. I called sherriff told me not to call back that ot was a plain or helicopter and I was mistaken I would of video taped but no cell phone thingy camera its dark out here in rosevalley goble creek area but looked just like stars from a far weird noise it was making I got my gun just in case its the mountins here no jokevthen they light up ground made a sonic boom three times and disapered left a strong sulfur smell in the air and heated outside up a lot they or it were taking bolders from the creek I'm 87 years old and nevervseen this before in rosevalley......
